name: An Apple a Day (Hulya)
description:
Harvest all the apples in the village!!! …or spare some for the folk.

(There are two ending platforms according to how much you fill your buckets.)

Cheat: if you fail to fill a bucket jump off the platform.  It resets the apple spawning.

My jam submission to Ludum Dare 52 - Themed Harvest. 

This project and most of the assets were made by me solo.

As for the downloaded ones:

Character and animations are from Mixamo: https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...

Music by mepa melson from Pixabay (tropical reggae united)
